info.title: Sales Contract (A2X)
info.description:
The service contains header and item entities, as well as their sub-entities for partners and pricing elements. Once the sales contract has been created, the sales contract number is sent in the response with the data included in the sales contract. If there are any issues when creating, retrieving, updating, or deleting the sales contract, the system displays error messages in the response.

Note: Certain elements and entities can only be used if you activate the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM. For more information, see Business Documentation.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete sales contracts using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads all sales contract headers.
get.description: Reads the header data of all sales contracts in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.description: Creates a header of a sales contract. The consumer can use deep insert requests. This means the consumer can include the following entities in the payload:header partner, header pricing element, sales contract item, item partner, and item pricing element.

get.summary: Reads the header of a specific sales contract.
get.description: Reads the header data of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates the header of a specific sales contract.
patch.description: Updates the header data of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

delete.description: Deletes a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

get.summary: Reads items of a specific sales contract.
get.description: Reads item data from the header of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

post.summary: Creates one or more items for a specific sales contract.
post.description: Creates item data for a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number. The consumer must also pass the sales contract number in the payload.

post.description: Creates sales contract item data for a specific sales contract, which the consumer must specify in the payload. The consumer can use deep insert requests.This means the consumer can include following entities in the payload: item partner and item pricing element.

post.description: Creates value-added service data for a specific sales contract item that you must specify in the payload. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM

parameters.name: SalesContractItem
parameters.description: Item number of the reference item

get.summary: Reads a specific element of the value-added service at item level.
get.description: Reads a specific element of the item-level value-added service element using the sales contract number, item number, vas service and vas subservice. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the data of a specific value-added service item using sales contract number, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM

delete.description: Deletes the data of a specific value-added service item using sales contract number, item number, value-added service type, and value-added subservice type. You can use this operation by activating the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM

post.description: Releases the approval request for a specific sales contract. Consumer must pass the sales contract number.

parameters.name: SalesContract
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description: Rejects the approval request for a specific sales contract. Consumer must pass the sales contractnumber.

parameters.name: SalesContract
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
